bilingual.source: She is hailed as a national hero.

bilingual.target: 这起丑闻是国家的耻辱。
分裂主义可能导致国家的不稳定。

bilingual.source: National rejuvenation is the dream of every nation.
bilingual.target: 民族复兴是每个国家的梦想。

bilingual.source: The MSS is responsible for national security affairs.
bilingual.target: 安全部负责国家的安全事务。

bilingual.source: This ancient building is one of our national heritage.
bilingual.target: 这座古老的建筑是我们国家的遗产之一。

bilingual.source: Many national football associations are members of FIFA.
bilingual.target: 许多国家的足球协会都是国际足联的成员。

bilingual.source: Many national basketball associations are members of FIBA.
bilingual.target: 许多国家的篮球协会都是国际篮联的成员。

bilingual.source: The people's congress discussed important national issues.
bilingual.target: 人民代表大会讨论了国家的重要问题。

bilingual.source: The market economy has spurred rapid national development.
bilingual.target: 市场经济促进了国家的快速发展。

list.abstract: NATIONAL，现在 中国大陆更名为PANASONIC。 松下公司创始人松下幸之助做学徒时经常看到报纸上写着“International”这个英文单词，查字典后得知是“国际的”的意思，把“Inter”去掉，“National”是“国民的”意思。“National”作为时代用语有一种时髦的感觉，而且使自己的产品成为国民必需品是松下最终的奋斗目标。所以在销售炮弹型车灯时，松下公司初次使用“National”作为商标品牌，体现了松下幸之助以民族产业为骄傲，以国家昌盛为已任的奋斗目标。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the national intelligence director.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这位是国家情报局主管。

yingyinNormal.en: Where do you people live, National Geographic?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们都住哪儿啊，《国家地理》杂志吗？

yingyinNormal.en: One thing unites all Singaporeans, food. It's the national obsession!
yingyinNormal.zh: 新加坡人非常爱美食，而且非常沉醉于美食当中。

yingyinNormal.en: Eli, it's a national campaign, and I need a national strategist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伊莱，这可是全国选举，需要位相应人替我出谋划策。

yingyinNormal.en: In fact the benefit of the national brands over the store brands were identical to the advantage of the national brands over the discounted national brands.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上所谓的名牌药物的疗效优势相比于普通品牌药物，就好比于全价药和打折药物在治疗疗效上的区别。

yingyinNormal.en: When I won the National Book Award. Nancy was a fan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我得国家图书奖的时候。南茜是书迷。

yingyinNormal.en: Sue them. Sue who? The National Security Agency. Sue them for what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 起诉他们。起诉谁？国家安全局。起诉他们什么？

yingyinNormal.en: The National Science Foundation wants to give me a substantial grant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国家科学基金会要给我一大笔奖金。

yingyinNormal.en: Math club. National Merit finalist. Coney Island Hot Dog Eating Champion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 参加过数学俱乐部，全国英才奖学金决赛候选人，科尼岛上吃热狗比赛冠军。

yingyinNormal.en: I see Scott's point. Our expanding waistlines are a national wake-up call.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我明白斯科特的观点了。我们不断增长的腰围，是对全国人民的警钟。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, come on. What's that? Oh, it's an Osteo National bone-density scanner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 算了吧，那是什么? 是国骨公司生产的骨质密度扫描仪。

yingyinNormal.en: They're good jobs that typically pay about 15% more than the national average.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些工作岗位待遇丰厚，工资比全国平均水平高出15%。

yingyinNormal.en: When I got home, I was a national celebrity, famouser even than Captain Kangaroo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 回家以后，我成了全国有名的人物，比袋鼠船长还要有名。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't use national security matters for political purposes. You know that, Adam.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会把国家安全与政治竞争混为一谈，你知道的，亚当。

yingyinNormal.en: Pacific green sea turtles crawl ashore in Kaloko-Honokohau National Historical Park.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在卡洛高霍罗高哈吾国家历史公园里可看到太平洋绿海龟上岸爬行。

yingyinNormal.en: 1,700 miles southeast in Yunnan Province is the three parallel rivers National Park.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向东南方向2,700公里，在云南省，坐落着三江并流国家公园。

yingyinNormal.en: And with a ballooning national debt, arms-makers are under pressure like never before.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且随着国债不断膨胀，武器制造商也感到了前所未有的压力。

yingyinNormal.en: Muhammed Kalabi, 34, Syrian national. Local assets confirm his ID with high confidence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 穆罕默德·卡拉比，34岁，叙利亚公民，当地线人确认，他的身份可信度很高。

yingyinNormal.en: Samaritan has preempted multiple threats to national security. You're welcome, Senator.
yingyinNormal.zh: 撒马利亚人预先解除了多起对国家安全的威胁。不用谢，参议员。

yingyinNormal.en: But she is still a national figure, she helps us with the women's vote, and I trust her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但她仍然是个全国知名人物，她能帮助我们争取女性选民的选票，并且我信任她。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the most celebrated <highlight>national</highlight> figures have participated in historical events that have taken place within the EEOB's granite walls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多最著名的国家人物都参与了发生在EEOB花岗岩墙内的历史事件。

examination_example.sentence: According to the <highlight>National</highlight> Center for Education Statistics, nearly 80 percent of college students end up changing their majors at least once.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据国家教育统计中心的数据，近80%的大学生最终至少换过一次专业。

examination_example.sentence: No one tries harder than the jobless to find silver linings in this <highlight>national</highlight> economic disaster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有人比失业者更努力地在这场国家经济灾难中寻找一线希望。

sense_info_list.en: owned, controlled, or financially supported by the federal government

examination_example.sentence: These are mostly students who had no opportunity as children to travel to wilderness areas, wildlife refuges or <highlight>national</highlight> parks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些学生大多是在孩提时代没有机会前往荒野地区、野生动物保护区或国家公园的学生。

examination_example.sentence: "Many jobs are boring, degrading, unhealthy, and a waste of human potential," a lecturer at the <highlight>National</highlight> University of Ireland in Galway says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 位于戈尔韦的爱尔兰国立大学的一位讲师说：“许多工作都很无聊、有辱人格、不健康，而且浪费了人的潜力。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: By coordinating across local, state, and even <highlight>national</highlight> borders, officials hope that the worst-case scenario can be averted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官员们希望可以通过跨地方、跨州、甚至跨国界的协调来避免最坏的情况。

examination_example.sentence: She began a nationwide campaign to have a <highlight>national</highlight> holiday declared that would bring families together while celebrating the traditional festivals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她发起了一场全国性的运动，希望设立一个全国性的节日，让家人聚在一起庆祝传统节日。

examination_example.sentence: There must urgently be a meaningful mobilization of the policies outlined in the agreement if we are to achieve <highlight>national</highlight> emissions reductions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们要实现国家减排，就必须紧急有效地动员协议中概述的政策。

sense_info_list.en: owned, controlled, or financially supported by the federal government

examination_example.sentence: China's <highlight>National</highlight> Bureau of Statistics, China's State Council Leading Group Office of Poverty Alleviation and Development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国国家统计局、国务院扶贫开发领导小组办公室。

examination_example.sentence: He was unable to break with authority, and served Mussolini faithfully (as president of Italy's <highlight>national</highlight> research council and royal academy).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他无法与权威决裂，忠心耿耿地为墨索里尼服务（作为意大利国家研究委员会和皇家学院的主席）。

examination_example.sentence: Jean-Michel Leniaud, the president of the scientific council at the <highlight>National</highlight> Heritage Institute, said: "What happened was bound to happen. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国家遗产研究所科学委员会主席Jean-Michel Leniaud说：“发生的事情是注定要发生的。”

word_usage.usage: national在句中常用作定语,无比较级和最高级形式。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Wind chills were 64 degrees below zero in Park Rapids, Minnesota, and 45 degrees below zero in Bu fao, North Dakota, according to the <highlight>National</highlight> Weather Service.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据美国国家气象局(National Weather Service)统计，明尼苏达州帕克急流区(Park Rapids)的风寒度为零下64度，北达科他州的布法奥(Bu fao)则为零下45度。

examination_example.sentence: Governor's Island is a <highlight>national</highlight> historic landmark district long used for military purposes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总督岛是长期用于军事目的的国家历史地标区。

examination_example.sentence: Creme would often spend his free afternoons at the nearby <highlight>National</highlight> Library reading books on art and architecture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Careme 经常在附近的国家图书馆度过空闲的下午，阅读有关艺术和建筑的书籍。

examination_example.sentence: Laura Chigi, a grandmother at the march, says the local and <highlight>national</highlight> governments have failed to do anything about the crowds for decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参加游行的老奶奶Laura Chigi说，几十年来，当地政府和国家都没能对游客采取任何措施。

examination_example.sentence: The letter was written by Darwin to thank an American geologist, Dr. Ferdinand Vandeveer Hayden, for sending him copies of his research into the geology of the region that would become Yellowstone <highlight>National</highlight> Park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 达尔文写这封信是为了感谢一位美国地质学家费迪南德·范德维尔·海登博士(Dr. Ferdinand Vandeveer Hayden)给他寄来了后来成为黄石国家公园的地区的地质学研究的副本。

examination_example.sentence: What is happening here reflects a <highlight>national</highlight> anti-intellectual trend that will not prepare our children for the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这反映出全国性的反智主义趋势，这对于孩子的未来十分不利。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The movie also won both <highlight>national</highlight> and international prizes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这部电影还获得了国家及国际奖项。
